name: Hide and Run
description:
Hide and Run

Players are divided into two teams. The props are trying to hide long as possible without hunters finding them
Currently there are three maps with all have unique props that can be used.

For default match is five minutes long and props have 15 seconds to hide. Player can always edit time settings before starting match.

    PROP

  • Can change physical appearance to props that can be found in map.
  • Tries to hide long as possible.
  • Can always use special abilities to get XP and get hunters close which could do make match more interesting.
